item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 22, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Hy 1.0.0, the Lisp dialect for Python, has been released (152 points | 26 comments)
2. HTTP: , FTP:, and Dict:? (203 points | 56 comments)
3. Show HN: I built a chatbot to converse with 3M SaaS product reviews (42 points | 19 comments)

5. Sci-Fi: Every Idea in One CSV (9 points | 1 comment)
6. Sieve (YC W22) Is Hiring Engineers to Build Video AI Tools ( | hide)
7. Trove of dinosaur fossils found high in B.C. mountains (34 points | 17 comments)
8. Flappy Bird for Android, only C, under 100KB (200 points | 78 comments)
9. 'I Don't Want to Die.' He needed mental health care. He found a ghost network (26 points | 8 comments)
10. Machine Learning Model Homotopy (46 points | 7 comments)

12. What happened to the Japanese PC platforms? (242 points | 150 comments)

17. Incredibly Ambitious SMB 3 Hack Released After 12 Years (38 points | 9 comments)
18. A Bay Area boy was kidnapped from a park in 1951. He's just been found alive (9 points | 1 comment)
19. What Is a Particle? (2020) (148 points | 124 comments)
20. Transparent Like Frosted Glass (5 points | 1 comment)
21. Scaling up linear programming with PDLP (196 points | 52 comments)
22. Infineon's CO2 Sensor Monitors Indoor Air Quality (160 points | 65 comments)
23. Show HN: PDF to MD by LLMs – Extract Text/Tables/Image Descriptives by GPT4o (116 points | 51 comments)
24. LsCs is a cross platform C++ GUI library focused on Medical Devices (24 points | 33 comments)
25. Logging all C++ destructors, poor mans run-time tracing (70 points | 28 comments)
26. Twenty Years of FM Synthesis Inside Ableton Live (126 points | 16 comments)
27. Kelsey Hightower: If governments rely on FOSS, they should fund it (7 points | discuss)
28. Analyzing the OpenAPI Tooling Ecosystem (105 points | 30 comments)
29. Emacs Speaks Statistics (77 points | 22 comments)
30. Show HN: Parse your Postgres queries into a fully-typed AST in TypeScript (99 points | 16 comments)
